definition: highly complex or intricate and occasionally devious
details:
adjective
- highly complex or intricate and occasionally devious
= example: highly complex or intricate and occasionally devious
= synonyms: involved
- of or relating to or characteristic of the Byzantine Empire or the ancient city of Byzantium
- of or relating to the Eastern Orthodox Church or the rites performed in it
= example: of or relating to the Eastern Orthodox Church or the rites performed in it
